ProjectTitle: Labour relations and border regimes in a pandemic scenario. A comparative study of migrant labour in the EU agro-industrial sector
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/07/2022
Sorry, I forgot to change to "no new upload needed", please ignore the previous email, no further actions from you are required 

Thank you for submitting a revised version of your DMP, just 2 minor suggestions to consider towards the end of your fellowship:
6. Preservation: For data preservation onedrive is not the best solution since this is linked to your account and expires after you leave, please have a look at the storage guide for alternative solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/nl
7. Sharing: Please note that KU Leuven now has an institutional data repository RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) that you can use if you like to share your (anonymized) datasets at the end of your project, here you also have the option to restrict access to the datasets but your data will get a DOI that you can use in your publication, and the metadata that RDR adds makes the data more findable.
